description.p: Returns the string Text with all occurrences of the string FromString replaced by the string ToString.

prototypes.prototype: Replace as C (Text as C, FromString as C, ToString as C)

description.p: Returns a string where all instances of the search string replaced with the replacement text.

discussion.p: The Replace function replaces all instances of a string in a field or value expression with the specified replacement text.

example.caption: Replace() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 Replace(CompanyName,'t','w') AS Expr1 FROM Customers =Alfreds Fuwwerkiswe
